Name: Where Thoughts Go: Resolutions
About the game: What are your new year's resolutions? Revisit the award-winning world of Where Thoughts Go in an entirely new, free VR experience. Explore the audio New Years Resolutions of countless others who were here before you - and leave yours behind for others to find. There's a twist, however: the resolutions you record will be sent back to you a year from when you play the experience. What will find, what will you say... and what will your future self think? Created by award-winning XR Designer Lucas Rizzotto.
